metadata.title: Need Help?

hints.text: Remember that every executable Java program needs a `main` method within a class.
To print output to the console in Java, you typically use `System.out.println();`.
For the "Hello, Java!" exercise, your code should look like: `System.out.println("Hello, Java!");` inside the main method.
